Definition.WordDefinition: encourage v 1: contribute to the progress or growth of; "I am promoting the use of computers in the classroom" [syn: {promote}, {advance}, {boost}, {further}] 2: inspire with confidence; give hope or courage to [ant: {discourage}] 3: spur on; "His financial success encouraged him to look for a wife"
